abstract: American Advertising Federation, Washington, elected its board for 2013-14.
snippet: American Advertising Federation, Washington, elected its board for 2013-14.
lead_paragraph: American Advertising Federation, Washington, elected its board for 2013-14. Wendy Clark, senior vice president of the Global Sparkling Brand Center at the Coca-Cola Company, becomes the new chairwoman, succeeding the immediate past chairman, John Osborn, president and chief executive at BBDO New York. Rich Stoddart, president for North America at Leo Burnett, becomes the new vice chairman.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
